name: Mystic TV
description:
2.5D FPS in which you play as an actor of a weird paranormal TV show about aliens, mysterious invisible yeti and ghosts.

Visit dangerous parallel worlds by using teleportation TV, make your way through Sumerian tombs, smash spaceship of alien hairdressers and find a secret goverment behind everything .

Features:

  • Unusual setting
  • Interesting locations
  • Good chiptune music
